languages.text: {n}Друкари склоняет голову, задумавшись на мгновение. Потом бросает на Ирлиэт косой взгляд.{/n} "Я должен был понять. По тому, что ты мне сказала..." {n}Маражай обрывает сам себя.{/n} "Впрочем, неважно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари склоняет голову, задумавшись на мгновение. Потом бросает на Ирлиэт косой взгляд.{/n} "Я должен был понять. По тому, что ты мне сказала..." {n}Маражай обрывает сам себя.{/n} "Впрочем, неважно".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари склоняет голову, задумавшись на мгновение. Потом бросает на Ирлиэт косой взгляд.{/n} "Я должен был понять. По тому, что ты мне сказала..." {n}Маражай обрывает сам себя.{/n} "Впрочем, неважно".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari baisse la tête pensivement, puis décoche un regard en biais à Yrliet.{/n} « J'aurais dû comprendre. Si j'avais su interpréter vos paroles... {n}Marazhai s'interrompt.{/n} Enfin, ça n'a pas d'importance. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari baisse la tête pensivement, puis décoche un regard en biais à Yrliet.{/n} « J'aurais dû comprendre. Si j'avais su interpréter vos paroles... {n}Marazhai s'interrompt.{/n} Enfin, ça n'a pas d'importance. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは考え込みながら頭を下げる。そしてユリエットを横目で見た。{/n}「俺は理解すべきだった。お前が俺に言ったことから…」{n}マラズハイは言葉を切り上げる。{/n}「まぁ、どうでもいいか」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは考え込みながら頭を下げる。そしてユリエットを横目で見た。{/n}「俺は理解すべきだった。お前が俺に言ったことから…」{n}マラズハイは言葉を切り上げる。{/n}「まぁ、どうでもいいか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋低了头，沉思着，随后斜眼看了伊莉耶特一眼。{/n}“你之前和我提到过这些事情，我早该意识到才对……”{n}随后，他突然住了口。{/n}“算了，这都无所谓。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋低了头，沉思着，随后斜眼看了伊莉耶特一眼。{/n}“你之前和我提到过这些事情，我早该意识到才对……”{n}随后，他突然住了口。{/n}“算了，这都无所谓。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari senkt nachdenklich den Kopf. Dann blickt er Yrliet von der Seite her an.{/n} "Ich hätte es verstehen müssen. Nach allem, was Ihr mir erzählt habt ..." {n}Marazhai unterbricht sich.{/n} "Nun, egal."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari senkt nachdenklich den Kopf. Dann blickt er Yrliet von der Seite her an.{/n} "Ich hätte es verstehen müssen. Nach allem, was Ihr mir erzählt habt ..." {n}Marazhai unterbricht sich.{/n} "Nun, egal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari baja la cabeza, pensativo. Luego mira de soslayo a Yrliet.{/n} «Debería haberlo entendido. Por lo que me dijiste...». {n}Marazhai no termina la frase.{/n} «Bueno, tanto da».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari baja la cabeza, pensativo. Luego mira de soslayo a Yrliet.{/n} «Debería haberlo entendido. Por lo que me dijiste...». {n}Marazhai no termina la frase.{/n} «Bueno, tanto da».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, düşünce içinde başını eğip Yrliet'e göz ucuyla bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Anlamam gerekirdi. Bana anlattıklarından..." {n}Marazhai kendine mâni oluyor.{/n} "Neyse, önemli değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lowers his head in thought. Then he gives Yrliet a sidelong glance.{/n} "I should have understood. From what you told me..." {n}Marazhai stops himself.{/n} "Well, no matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari düşünceler içinde başını eğiyor, ardından Yrliet'e göz ucuyla bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Anlamam gerekirdi. Bana anlattıklarından..." {n}Marazhai kendini durduruyor.{/n} "Neyse, önemli değil."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
